title: Suggestions for slogan font
tags: I have created a logo and need some recommendations on a suitable slogan font
content:
The slogan font needs to suggest warmth, caring, community, empathy, any ideas?

An example of the logo in question can be seen here: [http://www.ioimi.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019234908/http:/www.ioimi.com/ "http://www.ioimi.com")
author: Oimi

comments.content:
Helvetica? Museo? Zapfino? Need more input.

- Lex
